resources.string: Collect all device information needed for Hovatek Online TWRP Builder

Tap 'Collect Info' to gather your device information for TWRP Builder.

This app will collect:
• Device codename and model
• Android version
• Screen resolution
• CPU architecture
• Kernel version
• Touch driver information
• And more!

Use the search bar to filter information.

The information will be saved to:
sdcard/Download/twrp-builder-{codename}.txt
